dcterms:description: A curated C/C++ source code vulnerability dataset, CVEFunctionGraphEmbeddings (CVEFGE), which contains authentic and publicly disclosed source code vulnerabilities, including their control flow graphs and learned representations.
dcterms:title: CVEFunctionGraphEmbeddings (CVEFGE)

dcterms:description: A dataset containing vulnerable source codes, fixed versions, and descriptive information, collected from various open-source repositories.
dcterms:title: Big-Vul
